plugin.title: Grails XMPP Plugin
plugin.description: \ Provides XMPP/Jabber based services to grails applications. Built upon the Smack API this plugin allows an application to send and receive xmpp packets (presence, message, etc). Basically it creates a Roster which automatically connects, to a pre configured host, at application startup. All the mentioned xmpp services rely upon this Roster. Eases the development of real-time web applications. One of the main features is the ability to expose methods as commands (method name = command) making it easier to develop XmppBots, for example. Another feature is auto-detection of PacketListeners and RosterListeners.
